member.name: DCOMPOSITION_COMPOSITE_MODE
member.summary: The mode to use to blend the bitmap content of a visual with the render target.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_COMPOSITE_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_COMPOSITE_MODE_MIN_BLEND
member.summary: Bitmap colors subtract for color channels in the background.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_COMPOSITE_MODE.DCOMPOSITION_COMPOSITE_MODE_INHERIT
member.summary: Bitmaps are blended according to the mode established by the parent visual.
